original_text: Every bed on which she lies, all the days of her discharge, shall be to her as the bed of her impurity. And everything on which she sits shall be unclean, as in the uncleanness of her menstrual impurity.
korean_text: 그의 유출이 있는 모든 날 동안에 그가 눕는 침상은 그에게 불결한 때의 침상과 같고 그가 앉는 모든 자리도 부정함이 불결한 때의 부정과 같으니

sentences.original_text: Every bed on which she lies
all the days of her discharge
shall be to her as the bed of her impurity
And everything on which she sits
as in the uncleanness of her menstrual impurity
